tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpactAnalysis (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  application_name VARCHAR,
  impact_category VARCHAR,
  measurement_unit VARCHAR,
  data_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpactData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    nanotechnology_application VARCHAR(255),
    environmental_parameter VARCHAR(255),
    measurement_value FLOAT,
    measurement_unit VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearcherData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    affiliation VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    publication_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE NanoparticleData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    nanoparticle_name VARCHAR(255),
    composition VARCHAR(255),
    size_nm FLOAT,
    toxicity_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE nanotechnology_impact_data (
    research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_title VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    research_date DATE,
    research_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE research_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_id INT,
    result_value FLOAT,
    result_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (research_id) REFERENCES nanotechnology_impact_data(research_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_id INT,
    publication_title VARCHAR(255),
    source_url VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (research_id) REFERENCES nanotechnology_impact_data(research_id)
);

CREATE TABLE nanotechnology_research (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	project_name TEXT,
	researcher_name TEXT,
	research_area TEXT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_results (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	nanomaterial_used TEXT,
	experiment_results TEXT,
	impact_factor FLOAT,
	publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_partners (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	partner_name TEXT,
	organization TEXT,
	contact_person TEXT,
	email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sustainability_metrics (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	metric_name TEXT,
	metric_value FLOAT,
	measurement_unit TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_locations (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	location_name TEXT,
	coordinates TEXT,
	region TEXT,
	country TEXT
)
